QuestData.Title: Heroes of the Shado-Pan
QuestData.Description: You said that Taran Zhu is in Townlong and was asking for me? Must be something important...
QuestData.LogDescription: Return with Hawkmaster Nurong to Taran Zhu at Rensai's Watchpost.
QuestData.RewardText: I like that I can always depend on you. You have the spirit of a true Shado-Pan.
